summary: Greetings Nexus today I bring you a fantastic supporter to help them both in missions like taking it for a ride, will certainly be a great companion.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://k35.kn3.net/207E51236.png[/img]
[b]Aria The Necromancer Necromancer is a fantastic, powerful magic sticks uses to fight, but not before its use is weak because it has a repertoire of magic and a cry that makes relentless, plus it can be useful as both hostile territory anywhere in skyrim.[/b]
----
[img]http://k45.kn3.net/540C41ED5.png[/img]
----
[b]Description:[/b]
[i]Name: Aria
Style: Necromancer
Magic sticks: Conjure Storm Atronach, Dread Zombie Conjure, Conjure Dremora Lord.
Spells: The three elements of Fire, Ice and Lightning, also spells to conjure zombies.
Words of Power: Ice Form.[/i]
----
[b]is located in the center of the whiterun altar bench talos.[/b]
----
questions:
Q = Why did not some makeup to the face?
A = simple that looked great and did not want to make use of other mods.

Q = I can change clothes?
A = course has plainclothes default but can be removed and placed another.

Q = plan to make any changes?
A = For the time being, unless you have problems, but I doubt it.
----
I recommend the following mods I use personally.
CBBE the latest version.
UFO latest version.
Killer Keos the latest version.
and a mod to remove the helmet any similar.

-----
